AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Sorasaki Hina
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The president of the Disciplinary committee of Gehenna that is feared by everyone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shiromi Iori
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Enrolled in Gehenna Academy, Iori is a ruthless specialist of the Public Morals Committee.
